author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Giants vs. Eagles: LIVE BOXSCORE
text:
Al Bello/Getty Images The Giants face NFC East rival Philadelphia on Monday Night Football. Winners of three straight, the NFC East-leading Giants look to make it four in a row Monday night in Philadelphia.
* * *
Desktop users can follow the action right here with the live box score below and can click off for expanded stats and scoring by clicking the Gameview link.
